properties.name: Blue Lagoon
properties.description: Iconic geothermal spa with milky-blue mineral-rich waters surrounded by black lava fields

properties.name: Gullfoss
properties.description: Majestic two-tiered waterfall plunging 32m into a dramatic canyon on the Golden Circle

properties.name: Geysir
properties.description: Geothermal area with Strokkur geyser erupting every 5-10 minutes up to 30m high

properties.name: Jökulsárlón Glacier Lagoon
properties.description: Stunning glacial lake filled with floating icebergs calved from Vatnajökull glacier

properties.name: Skógafoss
properties.description: Powerful 60m waterfall with frequent rainbows and stairs to panoramic viewpoint

properties.name: Seljalandsfoss
properties.description: Unique 65m waterfall where you can walk behind the curtain of water

properties.name: Þingvellir National Park
properties.description: UNESCO site where tectonic plates meet, site of world's oldest parliament

properties.name: Reynisfjara Black Sand Beach
properties.description: Dramatic black volcanic beach with towering basalt columns and powerful waves
